name: Uhive (HVE2)
description:
Uhive is a mature, innovative social network with 3 million engaged users, ready to usher in a new era with the introduction of an Advanced AI and iOS compatibility. With more than 18,000 reviews on the Play Store boasting a rating of 4.5/5, Uhive is prepared to become the next big global social network. Having built a self-sustained economy, evidenced by 1.8 million wallets and 40 million transactions within the app, Uhive showcases the tangible value of its native token. We are a real product with a social network first approach where millions of users interact, and the crypto component is a seamless part of the platform enhancing the user experience. As we edge closer to prime time, marked by major technological advancements, Uhive continues to redefine social networking norms, offering a unique blend of social interactions and tangible crypto value. We've invested years of hard work to introduce a new kind of social network, aiming for a massive release this December.
